程序包 PixivCookbook.Controller

类 WindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • PixivCookbook.Controller.WindowController
  • public class WindowController
extends javafx.application.Application
    This is the controller class for main window class

      • alertBoxForbidPair

        public static void alertBoxForbidPair​(java.lang.String forbid1,
                                      java.lang.String forbid2)
        参数:
        forbid1 - one of the forbidden pair
        forbid2 - the other of the forbidden pair alert box ask whether user want to save ingredients in the database although they may collide with each other

      • alertBoxForbidPairView

        public static void alertBoxForbidPairView​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> forbidInfo)
        参数:
        forbidInfo - the forbidden ingredient pair information alert box user enter in some ingredients and offense the forbidden ingredient pair in database this will alert user about which is the pair displayed when view the recipe

      • alertImgPathNotValid

        public static void alertImgPathNotValid()
        check if the image path is valid

        返回:
        true if denotes a double

      • addRecommendButtonAction

        public void addRecommendButtonAction​(Main main)
        参数:
        main - bind actions on recommend button flush, get 7 recipes by random from database if in a search state then eliminate the back button clear the search box

        public void addTempAction​(java.util.List<Recipe> recipe,
                          Main main)
        参数:
        recipe - a list of recipes displayed
        main - main window set the 7 recipes on the main window with action and prepare the information for display on the recipe window

      • addHomeAction

        public void addHomeAction​(RecipeWindow rmain)
        参数:
        rmain - home action

      • addForbidAction

        public void addForbidAction​(RecipeWindow rwin)
        参数:
        rwin - recipe window when view a recipe it will check if the recipe contains a forbidden pair

      • addEditAction

        public void addEditAction​(RecipeWindow rwin)
        参数:
        rwin - control the actions and display when edit a recipe

      • editTitle

        public void editTitle​(RecipeWindow rwin)
        参数:
        rwin - bind title part with action should be renamed

      • editDeleteButton

        public void editDeleteButton​(RecipeWindow rwin)
        参数:
        rwin - bind delete button action

      • editImage

        public void editImage​(RecipeWindow rwin)
        参数:
        rwin - first check the title and make sure title valid then bind image part with action choose the image you want add it to the recipe if not in a valid image format then not flush

      • editMainInfo

        public void editMainInfo​(RecipeWindow rwin)
        参数:
        rwin - bind main information part with action with different illegal input warning

      • editIngredient

        public void editIngredient​(RecipeWindow rwin)
        参数:
        rwin - bind action to the ingredients

      • editStep

        public void editStep​(RecipeWindow rwin)
        参数:
        rwin - bind action to step part

                         Main main)
